name: conflux-microservices
description: Business-agnostic appointment booking platform with microservices architecture

scripts.install:services: bunx concurrently "bun run install:auth" "bun run install:booking" "bun run install:availability" "bun run install:notification"
scripts.build:services: bunx concurrently "bun run build:auth" "bun run build:booking" "bun run build:availability" "bun run build:notification"
scripts.dev:all: bunx concurrently "bun run dev:auth" "bun run dev:booking" "bun run dev:availability" "bun run dev:notification"
scripts.type-check:services: bunx concurrently "bun run type-check:auth" "bun run type-check:booking" "bun run type-check:availability" "bun run type-check:notification"
scripts.test:services: bunx concurrently "bun run test:auth" "bun run test:booking" "bun run test:availability" "bun run test:notification"
scripts.lint:services: bunx concurrently "bun run lint:auth" "bun run lint:booking" "bun run lint:availability" "bun run lint:notification"
